channel.title: [PI] Custom Interface [PI]
channel.description:
Hey, I've made an interface for my server in Photoshop. It's all good and working, the thing I'm having trouble with finding out how to get text in the spots. I've made a staff list that shows if there online or offline but I'm not sure how to get the labels in the correct space on the interface.
What I want to do is make the interface display there username, and green online if there online, or red for offline. But I know how to do that.
Thanks.

item.title: [PI] Custom Interface [PI]
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

Skyro:

It’s a client from Project Insanity, I think it’s refractored.

Probably Galkon’s then. There should be tutorials lying around here and on Rune-server
